sentences.english: Piracy is alive and flourishing on the world's commercial sea-lanes.
sentences.chinese: 海盗行为在世界各地的商运航线上很猖獗。

sentences.english: When blacks without uniforms do it, it’s illegal piracy.
sentences.chinese: 而当没有统一制服的黑人这样做，就是非法海盗行为。

sentences.english: Piracy has lately become big business around the Horn of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 海盗行为最近成为非洲之角附近的大生意。
他们转而进行海盗行为？

sentences.english: Piracy was also active in the waters surrounding Asia.
sentences.chinese: 海盗行为在亚洲附近的海域也同样活跃。

definition: International Court of Justice in The Hague
variant of 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3]/Somalia
the Arrow (a Hong Kong registered ship involved in historical incident in 1856 used as pretext for the second Opium War)
